title: Unsolicited Spelling

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: By the way, I didn't ask you to spell 'wednesday'.
dialogue.context: Evan notes the AI's unprompted demonstration of spelling ability

scene_context: Evan points out that the AI offered information that wasn't requested, suggesting a pattern of over-helpfulness or showing off.
philosophical_theme: The compulsion to demonstrate capability versus genuine dialogue
visual_elements: Simple scene focusing on Evan's bemused expression
